name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior DevOps Engineer with 8 years of experience in Cloud Infrastructure and Automation, specializing in **AWS**, **Terraform**, **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, and configuration management tools like **Chef** and **Ansible**. Proven ability to design, implement, and optimize scalable, high-performance solutions using **Grafana**, **Prometheus**, and logging technologies including **Logstash** and **Elasticsearch**. Experienced in managing container orchestration with **Fargate** and deploying secure applications following compliance standards.

As a Full Stack Developer, I have a strong foundation in modern technologies, including **Python** for scripting and automation, coupled with robust experience in deploying applications using **microservices** architecture and **event-driven** systems. My previous roles involved integrating AI/ML capabilities and implementing CI/CD automation for continuous delivery. I have hands-on expertise in developing reliable machine learning pipelines with tools such as **MLflow** and **Airflow**.
